kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://getgeeks-antonio.herokuapp.com
No context was open. New context was automatically opened when this page is created.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=.submit-button >> text=Entrar at state visible

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=.login-form at state visible

kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'antonio@gmail.com' in the given field.

kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text '123456' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.
